trans-unit.source: Built-In Desired State Configuration Resources for Linux
Resources are building blocks that you can use to write a PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) script.
trans-unit.target: Ressourcen sind Bausteine zum Schreiben eines PowerShell DSC-Skripts.

trans-unit.source: DSC for Linux comes with a set of built-in functionality for configuring resources such as files and folders, packages, environment variables, and services and processes.
trans-unit.target: DSC für Linux bietet verschiedene integrierte Funktionen für das Konfigurieren von Ressourcen wie Dateien und Ordnern, Paketen, Umgebungsvariablen sowie Diensten und Prozessen.

trans-unit.source: The following table provides a list of these resources and links to topics that describe them in detail.
trans-unit.target: Die folgende Tabelle bietet eine Liste dieser Ressourcen sowie Links zu Themen, in denen diese Ressourcen ausführlich beschrieben werden.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxArchiveResource.md)">nxArchive Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Provides a mechanism to unpack archive (.tar, .zip) files at a specific path.
trans-unit.target: Ressource <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxArchiveResource.md)">nxArchive</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: Bietet einen Mechanismus zum Entpacken von Archivdateien (.tar, .zip) in einem bestimmten Pfad.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxEnvironmentResource.md)">nxEnvironment Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages environment variables on target nodes.
trans-unit.target: Ressource <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxEnvironmentResource.md)">nxEnvironment</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: Verwaltet Umgebungsvariablen auf Zielknoten.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxFileResource.md)">nxFile Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages Linux files and directories.
<ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxFileLineResource.md)">nxFileLine Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages individual lines in a Linux file.
trans-unit.target: Ressource <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxFileLineResource.md)">nxFileLine</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: Verwaltet einzelne Zeilen in einer Linux-Datei.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxGroupResource.md)">nxGroup Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages local Linux groups.
<ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxPackageResource.md)">nxPackage Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages packages on Linux nodes.
trans-unit.target: Ressource <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxPackageResource.md)">nxPackage</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: Verwaltet Pakete auf Linux-Knoten.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxScriptResource.md)">nxScript Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Runs scripts on target nodes.
trans-unit.target: Ressource <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxScriptResource.md)">nxScript</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: Führt Skripts auf Zielknoten aus.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxSshAuthorizedKeysResource.md)">nxSshAuthorizedKeys Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages public ssh keys for a Linux user.
trans-unit.target: Ressource <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxSshAuthorizedKeysResource.md)">nxSshAuthorizedKeys</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: Verwaltet öffentliche SSH-Schlüssel für einen Linux-Benutzer.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxUserResource.md)">nxUser Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages local Linux users.
